explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of deep reinforcement learning for portfolio optimization, which is a subset of machine learning.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of deep reinforcement learning for end-to-end portfolio optimization.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs deep reinforcement learning and neural networks, which are part of deep learning methodologies.
explanations.representation learning: The paper focuses on learning representations of financial information through asymmetric graph structures and attention mechanisms.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses neural networks as part of the deep reinforcement learning framework.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper designs a multi-dimensional relationship attention mechanism to represent asymmetric graph information.
explanations.Large Language Model: The paper leverages large language models to decipher multi-dimensional asymmetric relationships between stocks.
explanations.LLM: LLM is an abbreviation for Large Language Model, which is used in the paper to evaluate and decipher stock relationships.
